name: King Arthur
cardText: You may return an equipment card from your graveyard to your hand. Modify power by +2 for each equipment card equipped to this Hero.

name: Morgan Le Fay
cardText: You may discard up to two equipment cards from your hand. Increase this Hero's power by the combined base power of the discarded equipment cards.

name: Mordred
cardText: After thid reveal, you may exchange any quipment cards equipped to this Hero with equipment cards equipped to your opponent's Hero regardless of attributes.

name: Ancient Merlin
cardText: Select any two equipment cards from your deck and show them to your opponent. Your opponent selects one to add to your hand, and one to discard.

name: Knight Lancelot
cardText: You may return an equipment card from your graveyard to your hand or you may draw two cards.

name: The Green Knight
cardText: Before second reveal, you may discard two equipment cards from your hand to prevent either player from shattering hearts due to battle.

name: Sir Galahad
cardText: When this Hero is sent to the graveyard, reveal and equipment card from your hand. The next time you play the revealed equipment card, treat its base power increase as +4.

name: Young Sir Bors
cardText: You may select  one Hero from your deck, reveal it to your opponent and add it to your hand. Draw a card for every heart on the selected Hero.

name: Knight Gawain
cardText: Send this Hero and your opponent's Hero to the graveyard. Do not shatter any hearts. Start the next round. Your opponent draws two additional cards at the start of the next round.

name: Armored Iseult
cardText: Select up to three cards from your hand and shuffle them into your deck. Draw a card for each card shuffled into your deck.

name: Mercedes
cardText: Select an equipment card from your deck and equip it to this Hero face up. Any equipment cards equipped to this hero are returned to yur hand at the end of the round.

name: Uther Pendragon
cardText: You may draw a card for every equipment card in your hand or draw a card for every equipment card in your graveyard.

name: Excalibur
cardText: Modify power by +1 for each equipment card in your hand.

name: Caliburn
cardText: Modify power by +1 for each equipment card in your graveyard.

name: Secace
cardText: Modify power by +2 if you have no action cards in play.

name: Merlin's Staff
cardText: Select a Hero from your deck with the same attributes as the Hero this card is equipped to and add it to your hand.

name: Shield of Faith
cardText: You may discard an equipment card when this card is revealed. If you do, modify power by +3

name: Gwyrdd Belt
cardText: The hero equipped with this card is treated as if it has one less heart.

name: Sunlight Galatine
cardText: You may discard this card after any reveal. When this card is sent to the graveyard you may retun another equipment card from the graveyard to your hand.

name: Trebuchet's Final Sword
cardText: If your Hero and your opponent's Hero have the same power at the end of the round you may modify your Hero's power by an additional +1.

name: Mordred's Cursed Blade
cardText: When equipped to a Hero, the original owner of this card may choose to modify power by +3 or -3.

name: Spear of Longinus
cardText: Modify power by +1 for each equipment card in play except this card.

name: Scutum
cardText: If you win this round your opponent does not shatter heart's due to battle.

name: Wounding Strike
cardText: Double the base power of any equipment card equipped to your Hero.

name: A Wizard's Curse
cardText: Negate the ability of both your hero and your opponent's Hero.

name: Lady of the Lake
cardText: Draw five cards from your deck and discard all cards that are not equipment cards.

name: Uprising
cardText: Return all equipment cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Call to Action
cardText: At the beginning of the next round you may draw five cards instead of two. Discard any equipment cards drawn by this ability.

name: Sword in the stone
cardText: Select two Heroes from your deck. Your opponent chooses one to add to your hand and one to shuffle back into your deck.

name: The King is dead
cardText: Discard one equipment card from your hand and return one of your shattered hearts from your graveyard to play.

name: Long live the King
cardText: Exchange this card with an equipment card from your graveyard and equip it to your hero.

name: Fateful Challenge
cardText: Draw two cards from your deck. If you draw a Hero you may increase your in-play Hero's power by the power of the Hero you just drew.

name: Noble Sacrifice
cardText: Draw three cards from your deck or have your opponent discard two cards from their hand.

name: Betrayal
cardText: Discard an equipment card from your hand and increase your Hero's power by the base power of the discarded equipment card.

name: A Warship Emerges
cardText: Negate the abilities of all equipment cards in play.

name: Leviathan
cardText: Modify this Hero's power by +3 for every shattered heart in your graveyard.

name: Great Sphinx
cardText: You may shatter one of your hearts. If ou do, negate the abilities of your opponent's equipment cards this round.

name: Glas Dragon
cardText: Shatter two of your hearts when this Hero is revealed.

name: Kraken
cardText: When this Hero is sent to the graveyard, draw three cards. This card is treated as two shattered hearts while in the graveyard.

name: Gorgon
cardText: Modify this Hero's power by +1 for every shattered heart in your graveyard. If this Hero is victorious in battle it is treated as two shattered hearts while in the graveyard.

name: Minotaur
cardText: You may shatter one of your hearts when this Hero is revealed. If you do you may add a card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: White Elephant
cardText: You may shatter one of your hearts when this Hero is revealed. If you do you may draw two cards and your opponent must discard one card.

name: Great White
cardText: Modify this Hero's power by +3 if one of your hearts was shattered during the last round.

name: Grendel
cardText: Send this Hero and your opponent's Hero to the graveyard. DO not shatter any hearts. Start the next round. Modify the power of the next Hero your opponent plays by +1.

name: Pegasus
cardText: Draw two cards when this Hero is revealed. This Hero is treated as a shattered heart while in the graveyard.

name: Phoenix
cardText: You may return this Hero from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of any round.

name: Beast of Gevaudan
cardText: When this Hero is revealed, either discard three cards from your hand or shatter one of your hearts. This Hero's power cannot be decreased.

name: Furious Fangs
cardText: This card is treated as a shattered heart while in the graveyard.

name: Blessing of the Gods
cardText: Modify power by +2 if you have lss than three hearts in play.

name: Armored Scales
cardText: Modify power by +2 if your opponent's Hero has more hearts than your Hero.

name: Metal Tusks
cardText: Draw two cards if you are victorious this round.

name: Gorgon's Glare
cardText: Your opponent must discard two cards if you are victorious this round.

name: Ulysses' Spear
cardText: Modify power by +2 if you have two or more shattered hearts in your graveyard.

name: Eyes of the Newt
cardText: You may discard a Hero from your hand to modify your Hero's power by +2.

name: Phoenix Feather
cardText: If your Hero is defeated, your may add it to your hand instead of sending it to the graveyard.

name: Poisonous Bite
cardText: Equip this card to your opponent's Hero, and equip one of your opponent's in play equipment cards to your Hero while ignoring the attribute requirements of both cards.

name: Infinite Webs
cardText: Modify your opponent's Heroe's power by -1 for each equipment card equipped to that Hero.

name: Heavy Steel Spikes
cardText: Negate the ability of the hero equippd with this card.

name: Faerie Rings
cardText: You and your opponent may each return a shattered heart from your respective graveyards to play.

name: Vicious Intent
cardText: Draw three cards if you have less than three hearts in play.

name: Fight
cardText: Draw one card for each shattered heart in both players' graveyards.

name: Flight
cardText: Discard up to two Heroes. Draw cards equal to the number of hearts on each Hero.

name: Survival
cardText: Shatter one of your hearts if you have two or more hearts in play. Your opponent must discard two cards.

name: Fury of a Monster
cardText: Select a single heart Hero from your graveyard and decrease your opponent's Heroe's power by the selected Hero's power.

name: Only Teeth and Claws
cardText: Shatter one of your hearts if you have two or more hearts in play. Negate the ability of an equipment card in play.

name: The Blood Circle
cardText: Shatter one of your hearts if you have two or more hearts in play. Modify the power of your opponent's Hero by -3.

name: Mountain's Heart
cardText: You may only play this card if you have less than three hearts in play. Return a shattered heart from your graveyard to play at the end of the round.

name: From the Flame
cardText: You may select a Hero from your graveyard and add it to your hand.

name: Cornered Beast
cardText: Modify the base power of your Hero to be equal to the base power of your opponent's Hero.

name: Rip and Tear
cardText: Shatter one of your hearts if you have two or more hearts in play. Return a shattered heart from your graveyard to play.

name: Snake Pipe
cardText: Modify power by +1 for each shattered heart in your graveyard.

name: Azothoth the Fool
cardText: You may exchange this Hero from your hand at the end of second reveal. If played in this way, modify power by -3 and treat this Hero as though it has every horror attribute.

name: Dracula
cardText: While this Hero is in your graveyard, you may banish three Heroes from your graveyard and exchange this Hero at the end of third reveal.

name: The Devil
cardText: At the end of third reveal you may banish three Heroes to destroy all in-play equipment cards, or you may banish six Heroes to destroy only your opponent's in-play equipment cards.

name: The King in Yellow
cardText: You may exchange this Hero from your hand at the end of second reveal. If played this way, treat this Hero as though it has every horror attribute.

name: Jack the Ripper
cardText: You may exchange this Hero from your hand at the end of second reveal. If played this way, you may negate an in--play Hero ability.

name: Swamp Creature
cardText: If this in-play Hero is exchanged, your opponent must exchange their in-play Hero with a Hero from their hand (if able), at the end of the reveal.

name: Frankenstein's Monster
cardText: While this Hero is in your graveyard, you may banish a Hero from your graveyard and exchange this Hero at the end of second reveal.

name: The Cultist
cardText: If this in-play Hero is exchanged, modify an in-play Hero's power by -2 and send this Hero to the graveyard.

name: Witches of Salem
cardText: If this in-play Hero is exchanged, you may draw three cards and send this Hero to the graveyard.

name: The Mummy
cardText: You may exchange this Hero from your hand at the end of first reveal. If played in this way, you may randomly return a card from your graveyard.

name: Priest of the Ancients
cardText: Terminate the round upon reveal. Your opponent may randomly draw two cards from their graveyard instead of drawing from their deck next round.

name: Dracula's Bride
cardText: You may select a Hero from your deck and send it to the graveyard. Modify this Hero's power equal to the heart-value of the select Hero (+1, +2 or +3)

name: The Magic Mirror
cardText: Upon reveal, you may modify the base power of this equipment card to be equal to the base power of one of your opponent's equipment cards.

name: Death's Touch
cardText: Destroy the card your opponent simultaneously reveals with this card. Your opponent may draw two cards, and choose to reveal a replacement.

name: Poisonous Apple
cardText: If the equipped Hero is victorious you may return any card from your graveyard.

name: Djinn's Ring
cardText: You may discard this card from your hand as if it was a double-heart Hero.

name: Necronomicon
cardText: Modify power by an additional +2 while you have two or fewer Heroes in your graveyard.

name: The Guillotine
cardText: If the equipped Hero was exchanged this round, modify power by an additional +2.

name: Executioner's Blade
cardText: If the equipped Hero is victorious you may return a different Hero from your graveyard. You may banish this card from your graveyard as if it was a Hero.

name: Sacrificial Dagger
cardText: You may discard a Hero upon reveal. Modify power equal to the heart-value of the discarded Hero (+1, +2, or +3).

name: The Game
cardText: You may discard any number of Heroes upon reveal. The Hero equipped with this card is treated as if it has one less heart for each Hero discarded due to this ability.

name: A Cursed Painting
cardText: If the equipped Hero is defeated, you may return a different Hero from your graveyard. Draw cards equal to the heart-value of the returned Hero.

name: Ancient Ankh
cardText: If you have no Heroes in your graveyard, modify power by an additional +2. You may banish this card from your graveyard as if it was three Heroes.

name: Monkey's Paw
cardText: Destroy this card if you have any other equipment cards in play. Negate the ability of the Hero equipped with this card.

name: Blood Moon
cardText: Upon reveal, you may discard a Hero. Modify the power of an in-play Hero by the heart-value (+1, +2 or +3) of the discarded Hero.

name: Endless Task
cardText: Select one of your opponent's equipment or action cards. While you have three or fewer Heroes in your graveyard, negate the ability of the selected card.

name: The Haunted Place
cardText: Randomly add three banished cards to your graveyard.

name: Horrible Return
cardText: Return any Hero from your graveyard. Draw cards equal to the heart-value of the returned Hero (1, 2 or 3 cards).

name: Time Itself
cardText: Negatively modify the power of all in-play Heroes equal to double their heart-value (-2, -4 or -6). You may banish this card from your graveyard as if it was a Hero.

name: Cask of Amontillado
cardText: Destroy all in-play equipment or action cards. Modify your Hero's power by -2 for each card destroyed with this ability.

name: Insanity
cardText: Banish any number of Heroes from your graveyard and draw cards equal to the number of Heroes you banished.

name: The Dark Forest
cardText: Negate all in-play Hero abilities. If you have two or fewer Heroes in your graveyard, negate only your opponent's in -play Hero ability instead.

name: Witch Trials
cardText: Your opponent must reveal their hand. Select a Hero card from their hand and send it to the graveyard. Draw cards equal to the heart-value of the discarded Hero.

name: The Cult Appears
cardText: Look at the top five cards of your deck. Select three and add them to your hand. Send the remaining two to your graveyard.

name: Mountain of Madness
cardText: You may select a card from your opponent's deck and send it to the graveyard.

name: Buried Alive
cardText: Treat your in-play Hero as if it has one less heart while you have three or fewer Heroes in your graveyard.
